verses.verse: And it came to pass <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things<s%>, that the <S%H8248>butler<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and his <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H2398>offended<s%> their <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5631>officers<s%>, against the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H8248>butlers<s%>, and against the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H644>bakers<s%>.

And he <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H4929>ward<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%>, into the <S%H1004>prison<s%>, the <S%H4725>place<s%> where <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> was <S%H631>bound<s%>.

And the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>guard<s%> <S%H6485>charged<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> with <S%H8334>them<s%>, and he ministered unto <S%H3117>them<s%>: and they continued a season in <S%H4929>ward<s%>.

And they <S%H2492>dreamed<s%> a <S%H2472>dream<s%> both of <S%H8147>them<s%>, each <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2472>dream<s%>, in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%>, each <S%H376>man<s%> according to the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> of his <S%H2472>dream<s%>, the <S%H8248>butler<s%> and the <S%H644>baker<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, who were <S%H631>bound<s%> in the <S%H1004>prison<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> unto them in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H2196>them<s%>, and, behold, they were sad.

And he <S%H7592>asked<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H5631>officers<s%> that were with him in <S%H4929>ward<s%> in his <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Wherefore <S%H6440>look<s%> ye so <S%H7451>sad<s%> <S%H3117>to-day<s%>?

And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2492>him<s%>, We have dreamed a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, and there is none that can <S%H6622>interpret<s%> <S%H3130>it<s%>. And Joseph <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6623>them<s%>, Do not interpretations belong to <S%H430>God<s%>? tell it <S%H5608>me<s%>, I pray you.

And the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>butler<s%> <S%H5608>told<s%> his <S%H2472>dream<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2472>him<s%>, In my dream, <S%H1612>behold<s%>, a vine was before <S%H6440>me<s%>;

and in the <S%H1612>vine<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8299>branches<s%>: and it was as though it <S%H6524>budded<s%>, and its <S%H5322>blossoms<s%> shot <S%H5927>forth<s%>; and the <S%H811>clusters<s%> thereof brought forth <S%H1310>ripe<s%> <S%H6025>grapes<s%>:

and <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3563>cup<s%> was in my <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6025>grapes<s%>, and <S%H7818>pressed<s%> them into <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3563>cup<s%>, and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3709>hand<s%>.
And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6623>him<s%>, This is the interpretation of <S%H7969>it<s%>: the three <S%H8299>branches<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>;

within <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H7218>head<s%>, and <S%H7725>restore<s%> thee unto thine <S%H3653>office<s%>: and thou shalt <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3563>cup<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, after the <S%H7223>former<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> when thou wast his <S%H8248>butler<s%>.

But have me in thy remembrance when it shall be <S%H3190>well<s%> with <S%H6213>thee<s%>, and show <S%H2617>kindness<s%>, I pray <S%H2142>thee<s%>, unto me, and make mention of <S%H3318>me<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and bring <S%H3318>me<s%> out of this <S%H1004>house<s%>:

for indeed I was stolen <S%H1589>away<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H5680>Hebrews<s%>: and here also have I <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3972>nothing<s%> that they should <S%H7760>put<s%> me into the <S%H953>dungeon<s%>.

When the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H6622>interpretation<s%> was <S%H2896>good<s%>, he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, I <S%H637>also<s%> was in my <S%H2472>dream<s%>, <S%H7969>and<s%>, behold, three <S%H5536>baskets<s%> of <S%H2751>white<s%> bread were on my <S%H7218>head<s%>:

and in the <S%H5945>uppermost<s%> <S%H5536>basket<s%> there was of all <S%H3978>manner<s%> of <S%H4639>baked<s%> food for <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>; and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> them out of the <S%H5536>basket<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>, This is the <S%H6623>interpretation<s%> <S%H7969>thereof<s%>: the three <S%H5536>baskets<s%> are <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>;

within yet <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thy <S%H7218>head<s%> from off <S%H8518>thee<s%>, and shall hang thee on a <S%H6086>tree<s%>; and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> thy flesh from off <S%H1320>thee<s%>.

And it came to pass the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, which was <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3117>birthday<s%>, that he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4960>feast<s%> unto all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>: and he lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>butler<s%> and the head of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.

And he <S%H7725>restored<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>butler<s%> unto his <S%H4945>butlership<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>; and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> into <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>'s <S%H3709>hand<s%>:
but he <S%H8518>hanged<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H644>baker<s%>: as <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had interpreted to <S%H6622>them<s%>.
Yet did not the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H8248>butler<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, but forgat <S%H7911>him<s%>.
